shows.title: Atlanta
shows.description: Two cousins, with different views on art versus commerce, on their way up through the Atlanta rap scene; "Earnest 'Earn' Marks," an ambitious college drop-out and his estranged cousin, who suddenly becomes a star.

shows.title: Billions
shows.description: U.S. Attorney Chuck Rhoades goes after hedge fund king, Bobby "Axe" Axelrod in a battle between two powerful New York figures.

shows.title: Black Mirror
shows.description: A television anthology series that shows the dark side of life and technology.

shows.title: Breaking Bad
shows.description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

shows.title: Game of Thrones
shows.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while a forgotten race returns after being dormant for thousands of years.

shows.title: Homeland
shows.description: A bipolar CIA operative becomes convinced a prisoner of war has been turned by al-Qaeda and is planning to carry out a terrorist attack on American soil.

shows.title: House of Cards
shows.description: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

shows.title: Master of None
shows.description: The personal and professional life of Dev, a 30-year-old actor in New York.

shows.title: Narcos
shows.description: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

shows.title: Orange Is the New Black
shows.description: The story of Piper Chapman, a woman in her thirties who is sentenced to fifteen months in prison after being convicted of a decade-old crime of transporting money for her drug-dealing girlfriend.

shows.title: Silicon Valley
shows.description: Follows the struggle of Richard Hendricks, a silicon valley engineer trying to build his own company called Pied Piper.

shows.title: Stranger Things
shows.description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying forces in order to get him back.

shows.title: The Americans
shows.description: Two Soviet intelligence agents pose as a married couple to spy on the American government.

shows.title: Veep
shows.description: Former Senator Selina Meyer finds that being Vice President of the United States is nothing like she hoped and everything that everyone ever warned her about.

shows.title: Westworld
shows.description: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged without consequence.
